content: Insurance PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by Jim NgAsked on 02 Mar 2019As Singaporeans get more and more literate, they can purchase insurance / financial instruments products themselves. What are your thoughts on this rendering "Financial Advisors" obsolete? ?Wouldn't these agents become nothing more than a pushy salesman doing outbound marketing? Btw, no offence to any financial advisor, I was one too.1 answerAnswerBump2
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019It wont be obsolete in my opinion. Good financial advisors can still give good advise and help those who suit certain financial instrument that you cant buy as a normal individual. Not all people are more literate as well because most of my friends are not into it right now and prefer to leave it to someone to manage.0 comments0
